question: Which state/UT announced that all departments of the government will use only electric vehicles?
explanation:
The Delhi Government announced all its departments would use only electric vehicles, transitioning over 2000 cars to EVs.
The announcement was made a day after the government launched a campaign, 'Switch Delhi', to motivate private vehicle owners to shift to electric vehicles. The campaign also urges them to install a charging point within their premises in the next three years.
